Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: We had taken the 5 course meal with the wine pairing. It was amazing. Their signature dish of prawns was my abs favorite. Soft and amazing and tasted aweskme. I also loved the first eel dish and the veal. To be honest the desert wasn't good ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text:
Young, friendly, ambitious crew, delivering a well balanced and delicious tasting menu. The wine package was well put together, multiplying the experience.
Especially finding a white wine that could handle the beetroot in such good way, have to be mentioned. Here are some pics from a great evening, money well spent.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Each dish was amazing. Amazing blend of different tastes. Super creative! We really felt spoiled throughout the night. Wine pairing was amazing. We had some really amazing wines that we have never heard of before - so definitely learnt something new. Personnel is amazing. Super attentive , fun and friendly. Couldn‚Äôt recommend more!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Very good experience for lunch on Sunday. Took the 5 courses with wine pairing. Nice dishes with a lot of Spanish and Japanese influences. Good wine pairings and perfect service. Would definitely go back for dinner sometime.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text:
We went for lunch and chose the 5 course.
Everything was really good but not really special for us and didn‚Äôt blow us away. ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: We had a very special experience at Senses. The service was great and the food was so rich in flavors. The brioche they serve at the beginning must have been some of the best I tried ever. The amuses were super delightful and everything seemed well thought out.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: A great fine dining experience with very friendly service and amazing wood. We have had 4 course tasting dinner with wine pairing and everything was spot on. I would definitely recommend it for everyone that would like to try something new and unexpected, and we would be coming back for lunch option in the future as well.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text:
We enjoyed a 7-course menu with the wine pairing which was very good!
The food was excellent; introducing interesting combinations and textures. It was beautifully served which made this a festivity not only for our tastebuds but ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Lovely 7-course dinner!! Delicious food and perfect service :-) Fair prices!! We are coming back!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Incredible meal. Every course was unique and delicious. And the wine pairings where perfect.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Superb restaurant, aptly named.  We chose the 7 course chefs menu, which came with several amuse bouche.  Plenty of food!  Each course had a different theme, or main ingredient, prepared several different ways.  Beautifully presented, and ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Cute place with great service and great food. There were 3 amuse which I think is quite a lot consider we ordered 4 cause menu. The eel was very tasty, loved it. I'm not a big fan of venison but their venison is the best I tasted so far. They have some interesting wine choices too, give them a try.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: First, make a reservation! The restaurant is quite small and it seemed like the only guests who ate here had a reservation in advance. You can choose between 4 to 7 courses, and each course is a secret until it‚Äôs served to you. Either ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Ok, I've loved every single course and wines, location and service as well! We took 7 course to have a complete experience at @senses_restaurant by @l.bertelsen + 3 course of wines and 1 champagne ros√© at beginning to start! It was really a ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: The food and the wine selection and the service were amazing.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: A very nice fine dining experience. The menu offers  4 to 7 courses with wine pairing options. If you are not a good drinker, you can opt for half portion. Their wine cellar is located underground with glass ceiling where you can look into it. Foods are delicious and services are good

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: An excellent restaurant with surprising flavour combinations and stunning presentations. We kicked off the meal with 3 amuses and the option of a glass of champagne. I thought that the price of the glass of bubbly (‚Ç¨17) was pretty steep but ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Wow. Truly awesome experience. Amazing food with new flavors I have never tasted. Not every course was kind blowing but most were. This was a great experience with great food and amazing service. If you are used to these types of meals (think Le Bernadin in NYC), this is close, at a fraction of the price.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Great experience. We had the six course tasting menu without wine pairing. The only reason we didn‚Äôt go for the max 7 course one was that one of us was allergic to shellfish and crustaceans and they couldn‚Äôt work around that for the seventh ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: What a foodie experience we had here! We went for the three course lunch tasting menu, with coffee and wine. First, we were brought an eel amuse bouche that was divine - so light and delicious. Then, we had a fish starter, an amazingly ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Fantastic food and service. Highly recommended. They ask you about your allergies and dietary restrictions and then they just send out incredible dishes. I went with the 5 course menu. It was fantastic. I had 5 courses plus multiple ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Had the 5 course tasting menu and it was really enjoyable. The service was casual and not too over the top. Most dishes were delightful. Didn‚Äôt really enjoy the duck course as it looked like a dessert but tasted savoury, definitely messes ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Excellent service in a relaxed and welcoming environment. Wine pairing was generally very good. Enjoy!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text:
Your taste buds will be surprised and you will not be disappointed!
My wife and I went to Amsterdam to celebrate our 5 anniversary and chose this place for a special evening, and we were not disappointed! From the start the ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Four course lunch in this very nice restaurant! Delicious food, fun service and great wine! 158 euro for two persons including champagne, a glass of wine and water! Highly recommend!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: This place is now my most favourite restaurant in Amsterdam. Professional customer service from a waitress, magnificent dishes, artistic design of food, we loved everything about it. Amazing.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Super perfekt food. We hve had the 7 courses, and it was ‚ÄûFoodporn‚Äú. The different incrediants mixed in a special way. Everything made a explosion of tast in my moth,brillant. A must go in amsterdam. The stuff was perfekt, friendly and allways the customer needs in view

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Went back after having a great food but poor service experience in February and this time we had the loveliest waitstaff and food was even better! Fun, interesting, and eclectic dishes; quail and the last dessert were delicious

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Had an amazing time at senses. We had the 3 course tasting lunch and wished we'd had time for the full 7 courses with wine pairing. We will definitely be back on our next trip to Amsterdam!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: This was absolutely brilliant! We were just strolling along the streets looking for something to eat and ran into Senses by coincidence. It was an amazing experience. If you are familiar with ‚ÄòNoma‚Äô from Denmark, they are really close to ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: So happy we went here! It was our last night in Amsterdam and it was well spent. We had the 7 course set menu. The service was super friendly and our server always had a jovial smile on his face. The food was just spectacular! The chef is just amazing. You have to go here if you are in Amsterdam.. no need to second guess :)

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: An absolutely amazing menu with some really delicious flavours. The wine pairing was also excellent. Definitely recommend to anyone who wants to try something a bit different.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Great presentation and service. We had a 2 and 3 courses menu for lunch. The main dish is chicken, was delicious but not as impressive as the first course. But I would like to try the dinner menu next time.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Excellent taste experience with good wine pairings. Would come back.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: The most amazing food that I have had. The descriptions of the food is just as sexy as the food. All I can say is thank you!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: One of the best meals I've had so far in my life .. Excellent service and food . Could not fault anything!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Warm welcome,  very delicious menu and wine pairing. Friendly service. Highly recommend

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Absolutely amazing dining experience. We got the 7 course dinner menu and everything was amazing from the staff, to the food, to the excellent wine choices. Honestly wish I could somehow rate higher!!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Incredible food and great service. I'd recommend the 5 course secret menu with wine pairing to everyone.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: By choosing 5 dishes course we actually got 9 by the chef,  all was surprising,  beautifull and delicious

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Amazing food, passionate kitchen en very friendly service. Would greatly recommend going here!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: One of my most favorite restaurants in town, was here having lunch with my Taiwanese friend and we had such a great time together xP

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Delicious, surprising food, great wine & prosecco, and very attentive service.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Really good gastronomic food but affordable price. Nice experience. Friendly staff

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Excellant experiance! We did the 5 course and it was amazing.  The service was great with three active waiter/ waitress we always had someone available.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: There are excellent restaurants and there are restaurant like Senses that communicate with you on another level, taking you through a symphony of colours, tastes and structure. You can feel the creativity, soul and passion barsting through ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: The food was presented beautifully and tasted as good as it looked. Actually, our favourite dishes ended up being the vegetable dishes. They were treated so well and had just the right balance of flavours. The quality of the fish and meat ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: If you think you're in for a treat... Your expectations are still too low. The culinary experience here is amazing.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Service was excellent. Nothing went wrong and everything was perfect. The portions were small but good and you were definitely full once you left. You don't get to pick what you eat you just pick how many courses you want and they bring ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: It was absolutely incredible. 100% recommended. Rudy and his team treated us like kings and we really had a great time. I brought my gf for her birthday and it was a 3 Michelin starred level restaurant. The wine pausing was excellent and surprising and the food was outstanding. Congrats guys!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: The dishes were all a remarkable mix of flavors, with subtle combinations that were a delight. The service was excellent. I drink a lot of water and can usually judge the service of a restaurant by how good a job they do keeping my glass full. It never went empty here. All in all, a delightful visit.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Wonderful experience! We enjoyed our anniversary dinner at Restaurant Senses tonight. The service was amazing and the food was a sensation. We would highly recommend 7 courses with wine pairings to truly experience as the chef intends. ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Service was excellent. Nothing went wrong and everything was perfect. The portions were small but good and you were definitely full once you left. You don't get to pick what you eat you just pick how many courses you want and they bring ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Wow. Truly awesome experience. Amazing food with new flavors I have never tasted. Not every course was kind blowing but most were. This was a great experience with great food and amazing service. If you are used to these types of meals (think Le Bernadin in NYC), this is close, at a fraction of the price.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Credit where it is due, Danielle did a nice job explaining the wines paired with each course.  Otherwise, there was nothing special about the service, and with many of the courses we would have like a better explanation of what was in front ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: It was a pleasure to be here and experience their culinaire, lovely and so friendly staff, great atmosphere, its nice to try for adventures

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: We had the 5 courses tasting menu pared with wine. Probably the best dining experience we had in Amsterdam. Don't know were to start expressing this fantastic experience. If you like to eat stylish, unique, sensational, inspiring food - don't think twice.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: The food was good but be sure to tell them if there was anything you would not want to have. For me that was pork, raw food and wine.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: We had the 5 course meal without wine which was plenty. The courses were tasty and imaginative although we didn't think much of the sweetbread course that didn't seem to go with anything else. Service trotted along at a decent pace and the prices seemed very reasonable. A very pleasant night out.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Absolutley Perfect Eve

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Excellent food. Went for the seven course meal with wine pairing and we did not regret.    Well balanced flavours and very good quality ingredients, a lot of them locally. Did get many dishes we never had before, like the main course made ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Went there with a group and had the four-course meal with wine-parings.  Had an incredible evening and a wonderful meal.  If you are a foodie, you will love this place...each course is a new experience and absolutely delicious.  The staff and chefs were great and everyone loved the meal.  Highly recommend.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Food looks like a peace of art  and tastes amazing. Chef is clearly an artist and knows what he is doing.  Service was really good.  The waitress knew what to recommend  for us and she was right. I would love to eat there again!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Wonderful experience.  I had the six course "surprise" tasting menu, my wife had the four course, both with wine pairings.  Excellent, creative food in a pleasant, relaxed atmosphere.  Three and a half hours, and totally worth it.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Tiny, minuscule portions for a hefty price. Paid 110 euros for a three course lunch for two people. Really not impressed by the Barbie sized dishes and strange/bland flavors. Friendly server, although we had no idea what she was saying most of the time because of her thick accent.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: very nice fine dining option, friendly staff, although the first courses were better than the last ones. ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Lovely food and lovely atmosphere. We went for the 3 course surprise menu and it was definitely surprising in a good way. Each item shows a lot of creativity in blending flavors from various ingredients and phenomenal attention to detail in its presentation.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: It's one of those fancy places where service is great and the wine always flows! Had a 4 course meal with only 2 courses that were worth calling out.the wine they pair is amazing .But for the price you pay you could have two very good meals elsewhere in the city.I kind of enjoyed the experience but I don't see myself going back.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: We stopped for drinks on the way back to cruise ship. We were served promptly but servers were surprisingly barely cordial. Our drinks were good.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: We had the 4 course surprise menu which was an incredible selection of stunningly pieced together dishes. A true concert of delicious culinary exploration. Good things take time, hence you should bring plenty with you (4 courses took 3 ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Fantastic service and stunningly presented food.  We had never done a multi-course, surprise menu and it was a pleasant experience.  Presentation A+, Service A+,  Flavours B+.  Overall for our family it was enjoyable but not necessarily repeatable.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text:
A place of its kind. Nice and exquisit. Central location and expensive.
We have been in many fine dining. Food is nicely presented but lacks of taste and variety... Expect variety of diffrent dishes. Service with a smile but at the ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: The most tasty food I have eaten in Amsterdam. Really special. Excellent wine. Fantastic service. Very small and cosy, but you need a lot of time.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text:
Very nice and innovative food but....
The waitress knows only little about the wine.
The environment felt really cold (we sat near the door). ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen

Review Text: Very nice restaurant with super creative food and friendly staff.highly recommend!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text:
Innovative and hype cuisine with a good proposal of pairing wines.

Young staff very well supervized. A special mention for the waiter from Cordoba ‚Ä¶

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: The food was, well weirdly unique but very tasty. I honestly thought I wouldn't like it but I actually enjoyed it. It tasted amazing & it was very cleverly presented.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Myriad of tastes provided by the food quest. I was speechless throughout the three hours spent there enjoying a five-course meal where every taste transformed itself in an ocean of senses. Looking forward to returning there and living the experience again! A must for food taste seekers!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: We tried the 4 course fixed menu lunch and we loved everything about it. The food and the wine were exquisite and our ma√Ætre d was lovely and attentionate. We already have made a new reservation to come back!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Worthy of a Michelin star. The wine parring option is a must as the wine are very good. The food is creative and titilates all the senses with layers of complex savours. A real degustation menu. Expect to endulge a good 3 hours in this experience.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: They don't have a la carte, only menu sets. All surprise menus. You also get some small bites in between the courses and they are all delicious! For the price you pay, it is more than worth it if you go for "taste".

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: This restaurant provided an amazing experience from start to finish. Excellent service, delicious food, enjoyable atmosphere...definitely a good choice for an outside-the-norm meal in Amsterdam. Highly recommended!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Fantastic restaurant. Very good food and any dietary requirements are really taken care of. The menu is very simple - just decide the number of courses and they will wow you with the food.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Had the 5-course meal and it was amazing! Portions are small but it gets filling after a few bites. Creative chef; great service; and romantic place for a date.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: The food is amazing! We went for the 4 courses menu and it was all delicious, colourful, elegant. Service also good! You can't miss this restaurant in Amsterdam.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Had a splendid meal here with family. We did the 5 course menu and it was a nice variety of flavors and the presentation was fantastic.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: The dishes were full of flavor, the service was excellent. This restaurant deserve to be visited if you are in Amsterdam. You won't regret your choice

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: This is classic! I've been in this restaurant several times and it always surprises positively (like it should üòâ). The service is excellent and the food is top notch. Exceeds expectations.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: A fantastic experience with some "trompe l'oeil" e.g. chocolate rocks. 1st meal excellent salmon, main course perfectly sauce and meat, dessert with unexpected combination. Sure we will come back!!

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Made a reservation through IENS website. Despite confirmation there was no table available in the restaurant. Mistakes happen, but the way it was dealt with by the restaurant was very poor; as if their fault is suddenly the customer's mistake. Can not judge the food but will never go back due to the mentality of the management.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: Very good experience with delicious food and delicate wines were mixed in a great combination. Smiling happy waitresses.

Name: Senses by Lard Bertelsen
Review Text: This restaurant delivered the best meal/experience I have had. Every dish tasted amazing and the staff was really friendly. I would go back to Amsterdam just to visit this restaurant.

Review Text: Me and 2 of my mates went last week, we're not their typical clientele but they welcomed us with open arms. It really was something else, I'd definitely recommend going if you're in the area. Top stuff!
